question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter describe the problem with the equipment. How this problem is affecting your work. Say what u want the shop or company to do?
text: I am working as a head fashion designer in one of the most reputed fashion designer store. As I need to arrange all my designs and work at one place, I bought an  Apple i pad from your store located on Sarabha Nagar market last month.I was really happy using my new Ipad until yesterday, when suddenly it’s home button stopped working. I think there is something wrong with the touch screen software.

Firstly, I have lot of important data stored in my device which need to be carefully transfer to another device. Secondly, I donot have time to wait for its repairs because I am totally dependent on my I pad for my work. All my appointment with clients and dealers are due  because of this issue with my device.

As my product is still under warranty, I believe you should exchange it to the earliest.I request you to urgently look into the matter. I am waiting for your best and user friendly service as soon as possible.
